name: Titles of Nobility
description: Marks of prestige granted to characters for exceptional service, representing noble rank and social standing.

titles.title: Knight
titles.description: The lowest rank of nobility, typically granted for valor in battle or exceptional service to a lord.
mechanicalEffects: You can use the title 'Sir' or 'Dame' before your name.
Commoners and merchants treat you as Friendly by default.
You gain advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks when dealing with nobles of equal or lower rank.
responsibilities: Answer your lord's call to arms
Uphold the code of honor befitting your station

titles.title: Baron / Baroness
titles.description: A minor noble with authority over a small fief or township.
mechanicalEffects: You gain a small estate and income of 10 gp per month.
You can levy a local militia of up to 20 commoners.
Advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks with the general populace.
You may hold court and adjudicate minor disputes.
responsibilities: Collect taxes for your liege lord

titles.title: Viscount / Viscountess
titles.description: A noble ranking between baron and count, often governing a significant town.
mechanicalEffects: Income of 25 gp per month from your holdings.
Access to a small retinue of guards (up to 6 guards).
Advantage on Charisma checks with nobility of lower rank.
responsibilities: Contribute troops and taxes to higher lords

titles.title: Count / Countess
titles.description: A noble with authority over a county or large territory.
mechanicalEffects: Income of 50 gp per month from your holdings.
A keep or small castle is placed at your disposal.
Command up to 50 soldiers (guards and veterans).
Advantage on Charisma checks in political negotiations.
responsibilities: Provide significant military contribution in wartime

titles.title: Duke / Duchess
titles.description: One of the highest-ranking nobles, governing an entire duchy.
mechanicalEffects: Income of 200 gp per month.
A castle and surrounding lands.
Command a standing army of up to 200 soldiers.
You can grant knighthoods and baronies to others.
Advantage on all Charisma checks in political contexts.
responsibilities: Serve on the royal council if one exists
Raise armies in times of war

titles.title: Lord / Lady
titles.description: A generic noble title used for landed gentry who hold authority without a specific rank in the peerage.
mechanicalEffects: Commoners treat you as Friendly by default.
You may own land and collect modest rents (5 gp per month).
Advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks with commoners and merchants.
responsibilities: Serve your liege when called upon
